sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnloginlog ( log_id , conect_id , conect_ip , conect_mthd , error_occrrnc_at , error_code , creat_dt ) VALUES ( #logId# , #conectId# , #conectIp# , #conectMthd# , #errorOccrrncAt# , #errorCode# , #creatDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnloginlog SET log_id = #logId# , conect_id = #conectId# , conect_ip = #conectIp# , conect_mthd = #conectMthd# , error_occrrnc_at = #errorOccrrncAt# , error_code = #errorCode# , creat_dt = #creatDt# WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnloginlog WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT log_id , conect_id , conect_ip , conect_mthd , error_occrrnc_at , error_code , creat_dt FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.LOG_ID , A.CONECT_ID , A.CONECT_IP , A.CONECT_MTHD , A.ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT , A.ERROR_CODE , A.CREAT_DT FROM ( SELECT LOG_ID , CONECT_ID , CONECT_IP , CONECT_MTHD , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT , ERROR_CODE , CREAT_DT , ROWNUM FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword#
CONECT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword#
CONECT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
